properties.headline: Flood Warning issued February 10 at 7:57PM CST by NWS Memphis TN
properties.description:
The Flood Warning continues for the Buttahatchie River...Little
Tallahatchie Canal...Tombigbee River...Yalobusha River.

The Flood Warning continues for
the Tombigbee River at Bigbee
* until further notice.
* At 7 PM Monday the stage was 18.2 feet.
* Minor flooding is occurring and minor flooding is forecast.
* Maximum forecast stage of 22.9 feet on Tuesday February 11.
* Flood stage is 14.0 feet.
* The river rose above flood stage Monday February 10 and will
continue rising to near 22.9 feet by  Tuesday February 11.
* At 23.0 feet...Bigbee Road just west of the river will flood.
Access to several homes will be restricted. Large area of farm land
will flood west of the river.
properties.instruction:
A followup Flood Statement will be issued when conditions warrant.

For graphical river and flood information...please go to
www.weather.gov and click near Memphis on the map, then select Rivers
and Lakes.

Do not drive through flooded areas...turn around don't drown.

Stay tuned to your weather radio and your local news media for the
latest river information.
